data.field: they get <c>DESTROY</c>ed their refcount drops to 0 they get collected they just refer to something else they just [doc://warn] if they're in an [doc://eval] they <c>croak</c> they form a circular self-reference and so continue to exist forever, but become inaccessible they [doc://shutdown] they are [mod://Exporter|export]ed if they are [doc://bless]ed if they are [mod://Acme::Damn|damned] they [doc://reset] <c>$self</c> they go out of scope they get [doc://undef]ined they just leave the symbol table they get [doc://dump]ed and hope someone remembers the reverse they accidentally get stringified and can't be restored they're obfuscated and [mod://B::Deparse] can't handle it someone enables [mod://strict] and they have to adapt or leave they're [doc://local]s and you move away they're deprecated for the next release they just fade to Python they just hibernate waiting for [http://dev.perl.org/perl6/|Perl 6]
